name: Push Button
Push Button Flow
info:
This has two states:
A and B.
All future refrence is to these two state names.

REQUIRED:
Inputs:
Button background colour for state A.  msg.colurA
Button background colour for state B.  msg.colourB
Button text for state A.               msg.txtA
Button text for state B.               msg.txtB
Font colour for state A.               msg.txtclrA
Font colour for state B.               msg.txtclrB
Payload for state A.                   msg.payloadA
Payload for state B.                   msg.payloadB
Topic.                                 msg.topicSET

Outputs:
msg.payload - this is used to control what ever you need.
msg.topic - this is if it is needed for control of the next node.
msg.colour - this sets the colour of the button.
msg.txt - this is the text to be displayed in the button.
msg.fontclr - this is the colour of the text on the button.

name: Setup
func:
msg = {
    "colourA": "red",
    "colourB": "green",
    "txtA": "SMORF - Off",
    "txtB": "SMORF - On",
    "txtclrA": "white",
    "txtclrB": "white",
    "payloadA": false,
    "payloadB": true,
    "topicSET": "Power"
}
return msg;

name: Push Button
Setup
func:
msg = {
    "colourA": "green",
    "colourB": "red",
    "txtA": "Master On",
    "txtB": "Master Off",
    "txtclrA": "white",
    "txtclrB": "white",
    "payloadA": true,
    "payloadB": false,
    "topicSET": "Flex On/Off"
}
return msg;
